alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with the highest amounts toward the Lander Foothills. Areas of blowing and drifting snow will also occur with winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Basin including Hudson, Pavillion, Riverton and Shoshoni. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In heavier snow bursts and blowing snow, visibility will be reduced to a quarter mile.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
